item.title: Hawks sign VFL gun to replace sidelined defender
item.description: Ethan Phillips will continue a long-standing streak when he officially signs with Hawthorn on Monday, with the past 17 winners of VFL's best young player award earning a spot on an AFL list

item.title: 'Life's not fair': Hawks skipper throws support behind luckless defender
item.description: Hawthorn captain James Sicily has been impressed with James Blanck's response after a knee injury ruined his season

item.title: MATCH SIM SQUADS: Dees' shock Clarry call, Tiger returns
item.description: The squads for Sunday's match simulation between Melbourne and Richmond have been announced

item.title: Eagles sweat on scans for first-year mid, veteran impresses
item.description: Clay Hall has suffered an ankle injury in West Coast's intraclub clash

item.title: Western Bulldogs season preview: Massive contract calls loom, draftee firms for R1 debut
item.description: There is some confidence the Bulldogs will be able to retain out-of-contract stars Jamarra Ugle-Hagan and Tim English, but the future of midfielder Bailey Smith remains uncertain

item.title: Giants pair set to miss Pies clash, young gun in doubt
item.description: GWS is bracing for a trio of injured players to miss its Opening Round game against Collingwood

item.title: Adelaide season preview: Is it finals or bust for rebuilding Crows?
item.description: Adelaide has been slowly rising after a four-year rebuild under Matthew Nicks, but finals is firmly on the agenda in 2024

item.title: Shades of 2021? Why Giants are 'on the same track' as flag Dees
item.description: Livewire forward Toby Bedford is bullish on the Giants ahead of the 2024 season

item.title: What to watch for in your club's pre-season hitouts
item.description: We take a look at what each club will be looking out for in their pre-season hitouts

item.title: Lions ready to unleash Brownlow medallist in first match sim
item.description: Lachie Neale jogged laps while his teammates had an intraclub hitout on Friday but he is expected to play in the match sim against Gold Coast next week

item.title: FULL DETAILS: Broadcast, ticket info for every club's pre-season games
